title: English Collocation Proficiency Enhancement Program via Flipped Learning and WhatsApp-Based Small Group Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English proficiency and comprehension of mathematical terminology
context.additional_context: Enhanced collocation learning in mathematics-linked English instruction for professionals, combining flipped learning with WhatsApp small-group activities in BYOD blended classrooms

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize 200 specialized collocations in mathematics.
Learners can reduce collocation usage errors by 40% by incorporating peer feedback during WhatsApp small-group activities.
Learners can create over 10 creative collocation problems related to mathematical terminology based on flipped learning content.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
